channel.title: 3d Printing on RoverAI - How to build a rover
channel.description: Recent content in 3d Printing on RoverAI - How to build a rover

item.title: Printing (almost) everything
item.description: At least half of the rover is going to be 3D printed. Considering the original author was printing for a month to make the whole rover, we decided to start early. This post outlines the details of transforming 3 kg of plastic wire into beautiful mechanical parts. You can skip this if you’re not into 3D printing ;).
